casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Theodore DOWNING, Defendant-Appellant. No. 384. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 7, 1940. Fred D. Kaplan, of New York City (Jacob W. Friedman, of New York City, of counsel) for appellant. John T. Cahill, U. S. Atty., of New York City (W. R. Mansfield, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment reversed in open Court.
